Example:
If the response is "Chennai" , look it up in the table to  nd it has the Charminar landmark. Then based on
the instructions, call the appropriate endpoint.

✈ Step 3: Choose Your Flight Path

Once you know the landmark associated with your favorite city, follow these instructions:

 . If landmark belonging to favourite city is "Gateway of India", call:

 GET    https://register.hackrx.in/teams/public/flights/getFirstCityFlightNumber

 . If landmark belonging to favourite city is "Taj Mahal", call:

 GET    https://register.hackrx.in/teams/public/flights/getSecondCityFlightNumber

 . If landmark belonging to favourite city is "Eiffel Tower", call:

 GET    https://register.hackrx.in/teams/public/flights/getThirdCityFlightNumber

 . If landmark belonging to favourite city is "Big Ben", call:

 GET    https://register.hackrx.in/teams/public/flights/getFourthCityFlightNumber

 . For all other landmarks, call:

 GET    https://register.hackrx.in/teams/public/flights/getFifthCityFlightNumber

💾 Final Deliverable

Return the correct  ight number based on your answer.

Only those who observe carefully will reach their true destination.

Good luck, explorer!

May the parallel worlds guide your journey home.

📜 Mission Objective

Your mission is to:

    . Get the city name
    . Decode the city behind the landmark
    . Choose the correct ﬂight path
    . Submit the    nal ﬂight number

🚦 Step-by-Step Guide

🔍 Step 1: Query the Secret City

Call this endpoint to get the city name:

GET https://register.hackrx.in/submissions/myFavouriteCity

You'll receive a city name like "Chennai" .

🧠 Step 2: Decode the City

Look at the city returned from the API response. Use Sachin's travel notes above to map the city to its
landmark, then follow the instructions to call the appropriate tool.


Page 3 of 4

🧠 Mission Brief — Sachin's Parallel World

Discovery

  "The ﬂights are live, but the codes are scrambled. It's time to explore, understand, and ﬂy."
  — HackRx Core Team

🌍 The Strange New World

Sachin, one of the core members of HackRx, woke up in a strange version of Earth. Everything looked familiar
— the air, the people, the languages — but something was… off.

He walked through the streets of a place that seemed like Delhi. But there it was — the Gateway of India
standing tall where India Gate should be. Confused, Sachin kept exploring.

He realized he had landed in a parallel world, where famous landmarks existed, but they were in the wrong
cities.

Each city had been swapped with the identity of another, and now it was up to Sachin — and you — to make
sense of this twisted map.

Your goal: Find the ﬂight number which takes him the real world

🧩 A Tangled Trail — What Sachin Noticed
